page.title: 20SERVICES IN WHEATHAMPSTEAD
page.content: {SERVICES:}In Wheathampstead village we have got two banks and one post office.The two banks are opposite each other.One bank is next to the dentist and the other bank is near to the church.The banks are called Barclays Bank and the Midland Bank.The Post Office is next to Hair Afair.The Post Office is also a shop. It sells sweets,toys and cards.People also collect their Pensions and allowances from here. {TRANSPORT,ROADS AND TRAFFIC:}In wheathampstead there are 6 roads leading to the village.There are a lot of cars that come through Wheathampstead to go to St.Albans and Harpenden.There is only one garage in the village.It sells bikes and the garage fixes cars and sells petrol.There is a nice river running through the village.
